alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Gonzales; Guadalupe (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:32PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Caldwell, northeastern Guadalupe and northwestern Gonzales Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 431 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Martindale to near Luling. Movement was southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Marcos, Seguin, Lockhart, Luling, Martindale, Uhland, Kingsbury, Staples, Fentress, Zorn, Palmeto State Park, Brownsboro, Joliet, Stairtown, San Marcos Regional Airport, Belmont, Maxwell, Reedville, McNeil and Redwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
